content.text:
# Czech Republic men's national squash team

The '''Czech Republic men's national squash team represents Czech Republic in international squash team competitions, and is governed by Czech Squash Association.
Current team
* Jan Koukal
* Petr Martin
* Ondrej Ertl
* Ondrej Uherka
* Daniel Mekbib
